item.description:
Hi everyone,
We've had a number of new members as well as interest from core team members about getting to know the types of equipment we use on our paranormal investigations, so I'd like to have an evening where I can talk to everyone regarding the equipment as well as basics on how to set up.

I'm encouraging anyone who is interested in electronics and has attended at least one monthly meeting (or with permission) to attend this event, so that you possess some experience and knowledge regarding some of our tech gear. I'll be talking about basic electronics, different cameras, types of DVRs, cables & adapters, audio recorders and EMF/Magnetic Field formation & detection.

Basically, this is what I'm thinking for activities:

8:00 - 8:15 Arrive/Introductions.
8:15 - 9:30 Basic electrical theory, types of equipment, setup/troubleshooting.
9:30 - 11:30 Team practical exercise/brief mock investigation.

Additional Notes:
Bring a notebook, flashlight, a folding chair for the discussion, and snacks to share.
Dress warmly as the scenic does not have its heat turned on.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the individual in jeans and a gray hoodie.
item.name: Equipment Training Session and Mock Investigation
